channel.title: About on John Forstmeier
channel.description: Recent content in About on John Forstmeier

item.title: About
item.description: John is the co-creator of Heupr and an avid Gopher. The project appeals to his love of creative problem solving and human optimization. He interacts with the Heupr code base on a daily basis. In his spare time, John enjoys lifting and yoga; additionally, he is pushing himself to read more books and is periodically attempting to improve his chess game. John resides in Philadelphia, PA.
